title: Motley Fool Money: 10.28.2011
description: European leaders make a deal.  Amazon, Chevron, ExxonMobil, Netflix, and Under Armour report earnings.  And BP returns to the Gulf.   Our analysts discuss those stories and share some stocks on their radar.  Plus,  Motley FoolUK Money Talk host David Kuo talks about the future of the EU.
